pr_title: allow user to pass AsyncMethodInfo at runtime.

timeline.message: allow AsyncMethodInfo on Invocation to override the configured AsyncMethodInfo, to give user a chance to change AsyncMethodInfo on the fly
avoid NPE when return type is primitive

timeline.bodyText: I think it would be better to put ConsumerModel in the constructor,because it wouldn't change and will get better performance
timeline.author: qinliujie

timeline.bodyText: I think you could get  consumerModel directly from invocation attributes
timeline.author: qinliujie

timeline.bodyText: why do you need a default value? just null is it ok?
timeline.author: qinliujie

replies.bodyText: when the return type is primitive type, it will cause class cast exception in proxy object.
replies.author: beiwei30

timeline.message: introduce method model in rpc invocation
